fields.query_expression: select count(*) > 0 from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.tag_history_logs.data_sensitivity where sensitive_field = True and starts_with(asset_name, '$project/dataset/$dataset/table/$table/')

select sensitive_type from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.tag_history_logs.data_sensitivity ds join sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.data_classification.infotype_classification ic on ds.sensitive_type = ic.classification_result where starts_with(asset_name, '$project/dataset/$dataset/table/$table/') order by event_time desc limit 1

select distinct result from (select case when exists (select 1 from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.data_asset where starts_with(data_asset_name, '$project.$dataset.') and is_authoritative = true) then true else false end as result)
select distinct data_owner_name from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.data_asset where replace(data_asset_name, '*', '') like '$project.$dataset%'
select distinct data_owner_email from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.data_asset where replace(data_asset_name, '*', '') like '$project.$dataset%'

select distinct use_description from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.use_purpose p  join sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.data_asset d on p.data_asset_id = d.data_asset_id and d.data_asset_name like '$project.$dataset%' order by use_description

select distinct sharing_scope_geography from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.provider_agreement p join sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.data_asset d on p.data_asset_id = d.data_asset_id and d.data_asset_name like '$project.$dataset%' order by sharing_scope_geography

select distinct sharing_scope_legal_entity from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.provider_agreement p join sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.entitlement_management.data_asset d on p.data_asset_id = d.data_asset_id and d.data_asset_name like '$project.$dataset%' order by sharing_scope_legal_entity

select distinct retention_period_days from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.data_retention.retention_policy where sensitive_category in (select sensitive_type from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.tag_history_logs.data_sensitivity ds join sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.data_classification.infotype_classification ic on ds.sensitive_type = ic.classification_result where starts_with(asset_name, '$project/dataset/$dataset/table/$table/'))

select distinct expiration_action from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.data_retention.retention_policy where sensitive_category in (select sensitive_type from sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.tag_history_logs.data_sensitivity ds join sdw-data-gov-b1927e-dd69.data_classification.infotype_classification ic on ds.sensitive_type = ic.classification_result where starts_with(asset_name, '$project/dataset/$dataset/table/$table/'))
